# tf.contrib.summary.histogram

``` python
tf.contrib.summary.histogram(
    name,
    tensor,
    family=None,
    step=None
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.11/tensorflow/python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py).
